bibdata.title: IEEE Trial-Use Standard for Connections of Insulated Aluminum Conductors
IEEE Trial-Use Standard for Connections of Insulated Aluminum Conductors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is intended to demonstrate with reasonable assurance that connections meeting these requirements will perform in a satisfactory manner, provided the proper functional class is selected for the application and they are installed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
